pages.text: $(li)The Illager Archer Towers are surveillance zones of the Illagers that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/desert)Deserts$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/forest)Forests$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/badlands)Badlands$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/mushroom/mushroom_fields)Mushroom Fields$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/plains)Plains$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/savanna)Savanna$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamp$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/taiga)Taiga$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Be careful, those towers are full of $(l:patchouli:illagers/archer)Archers$(/l).
$(li)You should visit them, on top of this tower they usually keep a $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chest$(/l) with provisions.
